overview: Aveena Lee stars in her first three-scene feature. She takes on three girls in some serious girl-girl action. Jolean, Leila Lei and August are the three happy sluts who gt down & dirty with Aveena. In her first scene ever Tyra Spanks finds out what it's like to have a girl for the first time. Samantha Slater, Chloe dior, and the nasty Georgia South also get in on the action. The best scene is between real-life lovers Phoenix Ray & Loni!
title: Favorite Favors
